ABOUTUS.p1: NOX by Ktheeb Is a company specialized in creating entertainment, established in 2017 Specialized in creating concepts and building complete entertainment.
ABOUTUS.p2: Through a short period of time the company made an outstanding model in transportable entertainment throughout the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
ABOUTUS.p3: Since 2017 and until this day the company has grown along-side its employees with their capabilities and the creativity spread throughout the department,creating exceptional entertainment contents.

JOINUS.exp: Do You Have any Experiences in this role?

EVENTS.description: No need to say about Our events cause we always aim to make you happy at the end with the customized event that satisfies your need with full pack  of our logestics of stage shows and the way of production and surely with branding your event and so on.

EVENTQUEST.title: Event Overview
EVENTQUEST.eventType: What type of Events are you planning for?
EVENTQUEST.eventHeld: Where would you like the Event to be held?
EVENTQUEST.eventLong: How long would you like the event to run?
EVENTQUEST.eventBudget: What is the project range budget?
EVENTQUEST.eventGoal: What is your main goal from this event?
EVENTQUEST.eventChallenges: Do you have any concerns or potential challenges in mind?
EVENTQUEST.eventAtmosphere: What is the identity and overall atmosphere?
EVENTQUEST.eventSimilar: Have you been to other similar event before? Positive/Negative?

AUDIENCEQUEST.title: Audience Overview
AUDIENCEQUEST.number: What is expected number of attendees?
AUDIENCEQUEST.invite: How would you like to invite the audience?
AUDIENCEQUEST.food: What food option would you like to offer the audience?
AUDIENCEQUEST.target: Who is the main target audience for this event?
AUDIENCEQUEST.guest: Will be there a special guest?

EVENTDETAILSQUEST.title: Event Details
EVENTDETAILSQUEST.name: What is the event name?
EVENTDETAILSQUEST.elements: What is the most important elements you want to see at the event?
EVENTDETAILSQUEST.intention: Do you intend to have MC, live entertainment or speakers?
EVENTDETAILSQUEST.registration: What registration system do you prefer to provide?

OTHERDETAILSQUEST.title: Other Details
OTHERDETAILSQUEST.hear: How did you hear about us?
OTHERDETAILSQUEST.meeting: Do you prefer to have a meeting with us?
OTHERDETAILSQUEST.touch: How do you prefer to get in touch with us ?
